title: Share of U.S. male/female adults following Major League Baseball ( MLB ) 2014
summary: Since 1982 , an astonishing 47 Share U.S. have been carried out in the male/female following Male adults .
In contrast , only 27 Share U.S. ( defined following the source as a single attack in a public place in which four or more victims were killed ) have been carried out following women .
gold: The statistic depicts the the share of the surveyed respondents that follow Major League Baseball . 47 percent of the male respondents said that they do follow Major League Baseball .
